summary: The story of a young painter from the Bahamas, Jonny Roberts, who travels to an exotic island to find inspiration but finds unexpected love and adventure in a complex and tortured Romeo.
cast: Jonathan Murray|Stephen Tyrone Williams|Rukenka Demeritte|Christopher Herrod|Jason Evans|Christine Wilson|Daria Delancey|Eric Williams III|Sania Johnson|Paul Cowderoy|Bernard Petit|Jackson Petit|Allan Wallace
director: Director: Kareem Mortimer (as Kareem J. Mortimer)
title: Float
